text: The Party for the Future () was a political party in the Netherlands. In 2020, it had two seats in the Senate, where it used the name Caucus-Otten (). The party planned to participate in the next election on 17 March 2021. == History == The Party for the Future made its beginning as the "Group Krol/Van Kooten- Arissen" in the House of Representatives. Henk Krol left 50PLUS on 3 May 2020 and started the Party for the Future with Femke Merel van Kooten-Arissen. On 28 June 2020, the party Group Otten became a part of the Party for the Future. Femke Merel van Kooten-Arissen left the party on 5 August 2020. On 18 October 2020, Henk Krol also left the party, because he did not agree with the decision to fire the party's treasurer. Furthermore, one of his employees received a threat from the party's secretary. == Sources == == Other websites == * Category:2020 establishments in the Netherlands Category:21st-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Political parties in the Netherlands
title: Party for the Future
